name: European Cocoa Association
goal:
On behalf of its members, ECA monitors and reports on developments impacting the cocoa sector, (scientific, regulatory and business-related).

ECA also publishes quarterly grind statistics and provides general cocoa-related information to interested parties.

In addition, ECA is actively engaged in European and International fora related to the industryâ€™s contribution to a sustainable cocoa economy.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Environment, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Public Health, Trade
